name: High Noon (itch) (Sundiray)
description:
Aim to shoot the bandits and avoid hitting civilians! Try to get the highest score within the timeframe!

Controls:

Move:A  - D ←  → ArrowkeysShoot:Leftclick

__________________________________________________________________________________

High Noon is an old school western shoot 'em up in 2.5D, inspired by the classic 'Moorhuhn' Series.

The game was originally created for a Unity Learn assignment with the task to create a prototype game with a simple counter. I later decided to polish it up and host it as a webGL build.
